RawLine: TNPC_20033001,【這寶藏可能藏於{color=#ff0000}過此寨門後的廣場之中{/color}，{p}來查看看江湖傳言是否為真。】,【这宝藏可能藏于{color=#ff0000}过此寨门后的广场之中{/color}，{p}来查看看江湖传言是否为真。】

Items.r: 【這寶藏可能藏於{color=#ff0000}過此寨門後的廣場之中{/color}，{p}來查看看江湖傳言是否為真。】

Items.mt: <[>This treasure may be hidden in the square behind the gate of this fortress, let's see if the rumors are true. <]>The treasure may be hidden in the square behind the gate of this fortress.
